snippet: Arsenal defender Calum Chambers signed for Premier League rivals Middlesbrough on a season-long loan on Tuesday....

headline.main: Arsenal Defender Chambers Joins Middlesbrough on Loan
headline.print_headline: Arsenal Defender Chambers Joins Middlesbrough on Loan

lead_paragraph: Arsenal defender Calum Chambers signed for Premier League rivals Middlesbrough on a season-long loan on Tuesday.

snippet: Leicester City midfielder Danny Drinkwater has been charged with violent conduct by the FA after appearing to elbow Watford's Valon Behrami in Saturday's 2-1 Premier League away defeat....

headline.main: Leicester's Drinkwater Charged With Violent Conduct by FA
headline.print_headline: Leicester's Drinkwater Charged With Violent Conduct by FA

lead_paragraph: Leicester City midfielder Danny Drinkwater has been charged with violent conduct by the FA after appearing to elbow Watford's Valon Behrami in Saturday's 2-1 Premier League away defeat.

snippet: Sadio Mane's red card for serious foul play in Southampton's Premier League game against Stoke City on Saturday has been overturned, the Football Association said on Tuesday....

headline.main: Mane Red Card Rescinded After Southampton Appeal
headline.print_headline: Mane Red Card Rescinded After Southampton Appeal

lead_paragraph: Sadio Mane's red card for serious foul play in Southampton's Premier League game against Stoke City on Saturday has been overturned, the Football Association said on Tuesday.

snippet: Tottenham Hotspur's head of coaching and development, John McDermott, has been handed the responsibility of overseeing every age group at the Premier League club below first-team level....

headline.main: Spurs' McDermott Handed Wider Coaching Remit
headline.print_headline: Spurs' McDermott Handed Wider Coaching Remit

lead_paragraph: Tottenham Hotspur's head of coaching and development, John McDermott, has been handed the responsibility of overseeing every age group at the Premier League club below first-team level.

snippet: Celtic and Scotland captain Scott Brown has retired from international football, the Scottish Football Association announced on Friday....

headline.main: Scotland Captain Brown Quits International Football
headline.print_headline: Scotland Captain Brown Quits International Football

lead_paragraph: Celtic and Scotland captain Scott Brown has retired from international football, the Scottish Football Association announced on Friday.

snippet: Spaniard Pep Guardiola has signed a three-year contract to take over as Manchester City manager in July, the Premier League club said on Monday....

headline.main: Soccer-Guardiola to Manage Manchester City From July
headline.print_headline: Soccer-Guardiola to Manage Manchester City From July

lead_paragraph: Spaniard Pep Guardiola has signed a three-year contract to take over as Manchester City manager in July, the Premier League club said on Monday.

snippet: - Sadio Mane struck four minutes into stoppage time to give Liverpool a last-gasp 1-0 win over derby rivals Everton that lifted them into second place in the Premier League on Monday....

headline.main: Mane the Main Man as Last-Gasp Liverpool Triumph
headline.print_headline: Mane the Main Man as Last-Gasp Liverpool Triumph

lead_paragraph: - Sadio Mane struck four minutes into stoppage time to give Liverpool a last-gasp 1-0 win over derby rivals Everton that lifted them into second place in the Premier League on Monday.

snippet: Sunderland have signed the Gabon international midfielder Didier Ndong from French side Lorient, for a fee of 16 million euros (13.58 million pounds), the Premier League club announced on Wednesday....

headline.main: Sunderland Sign Ndong for Club Record Fee
headline.print_headline: Sunderland Sign Ndong for Club Record Fee

lead_paragraph: Sunderland have signed the Gabon international midfielder Didier Ndong from French side Lorient, for a fee of 16 million euros (13.58 million pounds), the Premier League club announced on Wednesday.

snippet: The future of Manchester United manager Louis van Gaal remained in doubt on Monday with the Premier League club making no official announcement after it was widely reported in British media that the Dutchman had been sacked....

headline.main: Speculation Swirls Around Van Gaal's Future at United
headline.print_headline: Speculation Swirls Around Van Gaal's Future at United

lead_paragraph: The future of Manchester United manager Louis van Gaal remained in doubt on Monday with the Premier League club making no official announcement after it was widely reported in British media that the Dutchman had been sacked.

snippet: Middlesbrough's hopes of automatic promotion to the Premier League suffered a setback when they were held to a 2-2 draw at Birmingham City in a thrilling Championship clash on Friday....

headline.main: Middlesbrough Promotion Hopes Dented by Birmingham Draw
headline.print_headline: Middlesbrough Promotion Hopes Dented by Birmingham Draw

lead_paragraph: Middlesbrough's hopes of automatic promotion to the Premier League suffered a setback when they were held to a 2-2 draw at Birmingham City in a thrilling Championship clash on Friday.
